name: Cut it, Daniel! - GGJ 2020
description:
Global Game Jam 2020 entry

As a projectionist you work in a small room, with only three worktables, the main place with the item that you have to work with, a magnifying glass and a workbench. Your fellow projectionnist, Daniel, is a burden, he always destroy the movies right before a representation, with marvelous apologies every time. As the main worker of the place, you need to repair what he did, by looking at every fragment of the movie in the glass, and add it to the bench in order to make sure the spectators are fully satisfied.

Tools And Technologies: 

Unity

Technology Notes: 

Krita, Blender, DaVinci Resolve, Audacity, Git
